control.name: notEmptyTextEdit
control.memberlist: Validate Data via DXValidationProvider, DXValidationProvider.SetValidationRule method

control.name: rangeTextEdit
control.description: This editor accepts values in the range (1-100).
control.memberlist: Validate Data via DXValidationProvider, DXValidationProvider.SetValidationRule method

control.name: notEqualsComboBoxEdit
control.description: This editor accepts all values except one.
control.memberlist: Validate Data via DXValidationProvider, DXValidationProvider.SetValidationRule method

control.name: containsTextEdit
control.description: This editor accepts values containing a specific character.
control.memberlist: Validate Data via DXValidationProvider, DXValidationProvider.SetValidationRule method

control.name: compareTextEdit
control.description: This editor's value must match the first editor's value.
control.memberlist: Validate Data via DXValidationProvider, DXValidationProvider.SetValidationRule method

control.name: customTextEdit
control.description: This editor accepts values having one of the predefined prefixes.
control.memberlist: Validate Data via DXValidationProvider, DXValidationProvider.SetValidationRule method

control.name: manualValidate
control.description: Enables manual validation mode, where data validation must be forcedly invoked by a method call.

control.name: autoValidateCheck
control.description: Enables automatic validation mode, where editors' values are automatically checked against associated validation rules when data must be validated (for instance, when focus moves to another control).

control.name: btnValidate
control.description: Validates all the editors associated with the DXValidationProvider.
